arg.name: application
arg.description: Name of the audit application (mandatory). e.g. /api/audit/query/AlfrescoRepository : AlfrescoRepository

arg.name: path
arg.description: Full value path to search against. e.g. /api/audit/query/AlfrescoRepository/repository/login/error/user : /repository/login/error/user

arg.name: value
arg.description: Optional value to search for. If no 'valueType' is specified, then the value will be treated as a String.

arg.name: valueType
arg.description: Optional class name to convert the 'value' parameter. e.g. valueType=java.lang.Long

arg.name: limit
arg.description: Optionally limit the number of entries retrieved. e.g. limit=100 The default, when unspecified, is 100. Using extreme values will result in memory issues during the FreeMarker template conversion. It is possible to use the lower bound ID-based queries ('fromId'), in conjunction with the 'limit' parameter, to page through results.

arg.name: verbose
arg.description: Determine if entry 'values' should be returned. e.g. verbose=true : pull back all entry values e.g. verbose=false : ignore all entry values
